about_the_game:
About Graveyard Shift


Do you want to work in a graveyard? Maybe, maybe not. But now you have a chance to experience it! Graveyard Shift is a horror thriller based in a graveyard where you work the literal graveyard shift, but nothing is what it seems. Explore this supernatural world and uncover its secrets!

You will play as a young man in his mid-twenties named Alex, who has just landed a new job at the graveyard. You are excited, but as things start to happen, the retired groundskeeper, George, becomes increasingly intrusive and warns you about the place. Meanwhile, Mark, the boss, seems to be ignorant and blind. Or is he? Follow this thrilling story where dead people rise from the grave, secrets are revealed, and multiple endings await you. Is life a loop, or is there something more sinister?

Remember, your choices matter. Will you take advice and direction from George the grave keeper or follow Mark's lead? Maybe you'll even take the lead from some third or fourth party? It's your choice, but be wary; the graveyard and the forest have some dark secrets to reveal.

Remember, in death, you walk among the living. All your fears and screams will go unnoticed when you're trapped in this eerie, dark world. The question is, will you escape or just be another pawn?

Your Last Job


This might be the last job you'll ever be a part of. Or maybe not? Unearth the truth in this supernatural thriller set in a cemetery graveyard! Take on the role of a newcomer working the graveyard shift. As the night unfolds, strange events and supernatural occurrences start to happen. The boss gives you directives, but the Gravekeeper George has other plans. Navigate the shifting landscape and unravel the secrets hidden in the darkness as you try to survive until dawn. Explore the world that leads you around, and don't mistake anything for friendly or out to help you!

What Can You Expect?


Normal base-to-base gameplay and sneak peek of how the game will start out
Follow the beginning of the story that may unfold
Chase or be chased
Follow the hints and tracks around
Choose your own path
Find hidden clues to uncover the secrets of the graveyard.

content_descriptors.notes: There will be acts of death, violence, and explicit language in this game.
